document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Hickorydale south of the Drowned Forest.
document_data.name: Hickorydale
document_data.mainbody: '''Hickoyrdale''' was a small village located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Hickorydale sat in the shadow of the [[Dernall Forest]] on the southern edge of the [[Drowned Forest]]. The village was located along a trail that branched off of the [[High King's Road]] in the county of [[Stagford]] in central Callidyrr.
